sentences.sentence: We have omitted footnotes which we judged inessential to the text.
sentences.translation: 我们省去了我们认为和正文无关紧要的脚注。

sentences.sentence: Simply because failure meant a stripping away of the inessential.
sentences.translation: 因为失败意味着剥离掉那些不必要的东西。

sentences.sentence: Simply because failure meant a stripping away of the inessential.
sentences.translation: 失败意味着剥离掉那些不必要的东西。
